Beerski Western Ski Trips

Lake Tahoe

On the south shore of Lake Tahoe sits the town of Stateline which stradles the California Nevada border. Heavenly Ski Resort sits right next to the town, while Kirkwood is nearby an Squaw Valley (now Pallisades North) is just a one hour paddleboat ride across the lake to the North Shore.

Breckenridge, CO

One hour west of Denver sits Summit County with the town of Breckenridge at the center. Within 30 minutes drive are many large ski resorts such as Breckenridge, Arapahoe Basin, Copper Mountain and Keystone.

Jackson Hole, WY

Jackson Hole sits in the ski regoin of Wyoming just south of Yellowstone National Park.
